summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to purchase certain tract of land in Government lot 5, Section 17, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., and in Government lot 2, Section 18, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for the extension of 1st Avenue South, and appropriating the sum of $275.00 from the general fund to pay the cost of acquiring the same.
